cui_name: Childhood Nodular Lymphocyte Predominant Hodgkin Lymphoma
reasoning: Rare childhood subtype of Hodgkin Lymphoma. NLPHL represents ~5% of all HL cases; childhood HL incidence ~1-2 per 100k in pediatric populations, suggesting childhood NLPHL ~0.05-0.15 per 100k globally. Estimate based on proportional breakdown of subtype prevalence.
